page.title: 17Law and Order in Thornton
page.content: {Police Force.}Divisional headquarters at Scarborough has 250 officers. Six men work at Pickering and there is one resident policeman in Thornton.The police are called out on an average of 6 calls a day. {Crime.}The most common crime is theft from unattended vehicles, but violence and vandalism is on the increase. {Murderer.}Three years ago local life was disrupted while hundreds of officers hunted for police-killer Barry Prudham.He lived rough in Dalby forest and evaded police for a week. He eventually died in a shoot-out at Malton tennis courts.
